query: SELECT u.name, u.email, u.role as user_role, u.platformOwner, om.omRole as org_role, o.orgName as org_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN org_memberships om ON u.id = om.omUserId LEFT JOIN organizations o ON om.omOrgId = o.id ORDER BY u.id
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U3q1dt8GKGPLLB.root --database WN9ut9YEufdDjevBezkAVQ --execute SELECT u.name, u.email, u.role as user_role, u.platformOwner, om.omRole as org_role, o.orgName as org_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN org_memberships om ON u.id = om.omUserId LEFT JOIN organizations o ON om.omOrgId = o.id ORDER BY u.id
